BaseTemplate.description: An off-the-beaten path guide to Japan

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

tokyo.about_paragraph: Tokyo is one of the most exciting cities to explore, I wanted to share some of my reommendations for the city, which will avoid tourist traps.

beyondTokyo.meta_description: Recommendations for places to visit outside of Tokyo
beyondTokyo.about_paragraph: Japan is a country with so much to offer, and there are many places to visit outside of Tokyo. Here are some of my recommendations.

TravelTips.meta_description: Tips for making your journey in Japan easier
TravelTips.presentation: Japan is an amazing country, and new visitors often have lots of questions of how best to experience it. Below are some basic tips to enhance your trip.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
